entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening.
